mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_ID , A.CORP_ID , A.PROJECT_NAME , A.PAY_TYPE , A.BILL_ID , A.SMART_CH_CODE , A.PRICE_INFO , A.SUBBILL_YN , A.SUBBILL_START_DAY , A.REG_DT , A.UPD_DT , A.ALARM_USE_YN , A.ALARM_REQ_DT , A.ALARM_AMOUNT , A.USE_YN , A.USE_CH_GRP_INFO , A.NOPAY_YN FROM CM_PROJECT A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY PROJECT_ID DESC LIMIT ${rowsFront}, #{rowsEnd}
